SEARCH
Package com.financial.services.revenues

Class BudgetRevenueLogicService

java.lang.Object
com.financial.services.revenues.BudgetRevenueLogicService
public class BudgetRevenueLogicService extends Object
Utility service class that provides logic for managing and navigating the hierarchical structure of budget revenues.

This class includes methods for filtering main categories, searching by code, and traversing parent-child relationships within revenue lists.

  • Method Details

    • getMainBudgetRevenues

      public static <T extends BudgetRevenue> ArrayList<T> getMainBudgetRevenues(ArrayList<T> budgetRevenues)
      Filters and returns only the top-level (main) budget revenues. Main revenues are identified by having a code length of exactly 2 digits.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of BudgetRevenue
      Parameters:
      budgetRevenues - the list of revenues to filter
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing only the top-level revenues

    • findRevenueWithCode

      public static <T extends BudgetRevenue> T findRevenueWithCode(String code, ArrayList<T> revenues)
      Searches for a specific revenue object within a list based on its unique code.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of BudgetRevenue
      Parameters:
      code - the unique string code to search for
      revenues - the list of revenues to search in
      Returns:
      the matching revenue object, or null if no match is found

    • getRevenuesStartingWithCode

      public static ArrayList<BudgetRevenue> getRevenuesStartingWithCode(String code, ArrayList<? extends BudgetRevenue> revenues)
      Retrieves all revenues whose codes start with the specified prefix.
      Parameters:
      code - the prefix to match
      revenues - the list of revenues to filter
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of revenues that start with the given code

    • calculateSum

      public static long calculateSum(ArrayList<? extends BudgetRevenue> budgetRevenues)
      Calculates the total sum of all top-level (2-digit code) budget revenues.
      Parameters:
      budgetRevenues - the list of revenues to summarize
      Returns:
      the total sum of amounts for main budget categories

    • getAboveLevelSuperCategory

      public static <T extends BudgetRevenue> T getAboveLevelSuperCategory(T currentRevenue, ArrayList<T> revenues)
      Identifies the immediate parent (supercategory) of the given revenue. The parent is found by truncating the current code based on the hierarchy level.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of BudgetRevenue
      Parameters:
      currentRevenue - the revenue whose parent is sought
      revenues - the list of available revenues to search within
      Returns:
      the immediate parent revenue object, or null if none exists

    • getAllSuperCategories

      public static <T extends BudgetRevenue> ArrayList<BudgetRevenue> getAllSuperCategories(T currentRevenue, ArrayList<T> revenues)
      Retrieves the full chain of ancestors (supercategories) for a given revenue.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of BudgetRevenue
      Parameters:
      currentRevenue - the revenue to find ancestors for
      revenues - the list of available revenues
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all parent revenues, from immediate parent up to the root

    • getNextLevelSubCategories

      public static <T extends BudgetRevenue> ArrayList<BudgetRevenue> getNextLevelSubCategories(T parent, ArrayList<T> revenues)
      Finds the immediate children (subcategories) of a given parent revenue. Immediate children are identified by their specific code length relative to the parent.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of BudgetRevenue
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent revenue
      revenues - the list of revenues to search in
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of immediate subcategories

    • getAllSubCategories

      public static <T extends BudgetRevenue> ArrayList<BudgetRevenue> getAllSubCategories(T parent, ArrayList<T> revenues)
      Retrieves all descendants (subcategories) of a parent revenue across all levels.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of BudgetRevenue
      Parameters:
      parent - the ancestor revenue
      revenues - the list of revenues to search in
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all subcategories that belong to the parent's hierarchy
